Name: Tuscan Mule
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: A spicy long drink smoothed with vanilla.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2003 by Sammy Berry, Brighton, England. A detailed history of the Moscow Mule cocktail , of which this drink is a variant, can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Tuscan Mule contains 159 calories
